description: Try our easy to follow Coconut Rice With Caramel Sauce & Bananas recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Coconut Rice With Caramel Sauce & Bananas Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place coconut water, coconut milk, ginger, white sugar, cinnamon stick and star anise in a large saucepan, bring to the boil. Stir in rice. Reduce heat and cover. Simmer for about 15 minutes or until tender and liquid is absorbed.
Meanwhile, for the sauce, combine evaporated milk and brown sugar in a small saucepan. Stir over low heat to dissolve sugar then bring to the boil. Reduce heat, simmer for 3 minutes.
Serve rice with sliced banana and caramel sauce.
